{"id":941592177,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1682779592,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/941592177/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Sum With Exactly K Elements ","memory":"43.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximizeSum(int[] nums, int k) {\n        PriorityQueue<Integer> maxHeap = new PriorityQueue<>(Collections.reverseOrder());\n        for (int num : nums) {\n            maxHeap.add(num);\n        }\n        int score = 0;\n        while (k-- > 0) {\n            int top = maxHeap.poll();\n            score += top;\n            maxHeap.add(top + 1);\n        }\n        return score;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-sum-with-exactly-k-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
